metadata.name: THE BULL RUN in motion
metadata.description:
THE BULL RUN in motion is the tale of 5 humpback bulls chasing a female up the east coast of Australia. I was in the right place at the right time to capture these beautiful creatures in a powerful display of stamina and strength.


Documenting the annual whale migration for the past 5 years, it has been encouraging to see the numbers growing steadily for these once endangered animals. Witnessing this moment, and trying to capture it while racing to keep up with these fast moving masters of the ocean, was not only a rare treat but also extremely difficult to execute.


The piece is a 1-minute loop, created in HD widescreen. Hours of work were put into crafting the right sound design and music to accompany the visuals. The collector will receive a full high definition file in maximum resolution as well as bonus footage.


Artist: David Fairs  

Title: THE BULL RUN in motion  

Edition: 1/1  


Extended Editorial License: NFT holder is free to display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder, as long as the NFT creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with the NFT creator.
